SEARCH
Package app

Class Photo

java.lang.Object
app.Photo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Photo extends Object implements Serializable
The Photo class represents a photograph in the application. It contains information such as the file path, tags, creation date, caption, and last modified date.
See Also:
